attributes.action: Make mask wearing in classrooms optional not mandatory.
attributes.background: Allow all students in schools and collages to make their own decision on mask wearing in the classroom.Mandatory mask wearing will cause distractions in the classroom and should be up to the discretion of the student not enforced upon them.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Do not make it mandatory to wear a mask in the classroom
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/576843
